answers.answer: From 37 weeks they are classed as full term sweet :) there are all sorts of things to try, taking long walks, drinking raspberry leaf tea. Eating fresh pineapple, sex. Going over speed bumps. Unfortunately none of them are proven, but worth a try. Also drinking castor oil but be careful with all of them. Good luck lovely x

Me too! Im due the 29th! As much walking as you can handle and my doc told me lots of sex, the sperm helps soften the cervix apparently, ive dialated from not at all to a the in the last 3 days from walking around my complex and up and down stairs, and only had sex once. Also try a whole "fresh" (not canned) pineapple that also helps soften the cervix! Good luck to you! And if you find something else that works faster let me know!  =)
.....i think we have the same due date! Im 16 days away too! What are you having? Or is it a surprise?
I'm no help on this, but I'm due a day before you guys! April babies:)

I'm no help on this either since I'm not goin' to do any of the junk to "make baby come sooner", If my baby wants to come sooner then my Induction date (which Is on Thursday, the 18th, I'll be 39 weeks) then he will come when he wants to, It makes me feel bad that If he doesn't come by then, then they're forcing him out, but It's for both of our safety so It's understandable ( I have Mild Preeclampsia ). I wish he could cook until he's done bakin' and he decides when that Is. I juss wanted to wish you luck! Hopefully our babies will want to come out soon, I really don't want to be Induced!!! Team April!!! =-]
Im due the same day too :)
Yay im due the 29th too!!!!! Good luck. Im looking for ways to start labor too lol

I'm due the 27th of April & wish she would come out. I've done castor oil today 3 teaspoons been string cramps, but if this doesn't worked I've learned baby will come when it wants to but I have it a try. Which I'm starting to regret.

im due april 29th too and already at 3 cm dilated n still no sign of labor. i am in alot of pain tho like da worst cramps dat walking n shifting while sleeping is all impossible to do cus it hurts so much.. im just waiting on da day o for my doc to tell me is time.. so will c on mon wat dox says.

question: How do i help my labor hurry along i want my baby out keep having cramps but i just cant take the tiredness anymore and im already 16 days till my due date.. i dont want her to come to early because i know shes got to grow as much as possible but the time seams to be going slower.. so what natural ways could help?
title: 37 weeks and 5 days
